name: Garra

action.name: Battleaxe
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Javelin
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

description: Source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War p. 272
environment: underdark, mountain, forest, hill, urban, desert, arctic
